title: Funny Lady (1975) Barbra Streisand (STEREO,opt.subs ENG+NORDIC)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0073026/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0073026/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc., see enclosed Note): English, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish. (Sorry, Danish friends, your language was out of synch. Please use Norwegian or English.)

Continued story from "Funny Girl", of singer Fanny Brice's stormy relationship with showman Billy Rose (James Caan). This is the one with all the insanely lavish theatre production that fall apart.

This film has been desecrated over the years by the TV channels sending fullscreen pan-and-scan versions with mono sound. I could not find a torrent for it, so I made a rip for you. 

Surprisingly good picture and stereo quality for such an old film.

My ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed 
into just 700 MiB.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
